    • Method Detail

      • addEmployee

        public java.lang.String addEmployee(java.lang.String fname,
                           java.lang.String lname,
                           java.lang.String pos,
                           double firstParam,
                           int secondParam,
                           int empNum)
        Add employee to company
        Specified by:
        addEmployee in interface CompanyInterface
        Parameters:
        fname - First Name
        lname - Last Name
        pos - Type of employee: Manager, Design, Sales, Manufacturing
        firstParam - Manager-salary, Design-hourly rate, Sales-weekly sales, Manufacturing-rate per piece
        secondParam - Manager-not needed (0), Design-number of hours, Sales-not needed (0), Manufacturing-number of pieces
        empNum - employee number
        Returns:
        null if successful add. Returns a string that describes the reason for not adding the employee. It will be one of the following:

        1. There is already a sales person\nEmployee not added

        2. There are already two design persons\nEmployee not added

        3. There are already four manufacturing persons \nEmployee not added

        4. There is already a manager\nEmployee not added

        5. There are already 8 employees\nEmployee not added
